title: From The Basement To The Boardroom
features: Do you think it's possible to have life altering event happen to you, and yet still survive with no residual effects? From the basement to the boardroom is a story of a young girl who went from the abuses that a basement had to offer, to a boardroom with all she had to offer. This story will give you hope and encourage anyone who thinks they are just not going to make it in life.
description: Joanne lives in the suburbs of NJ with her husband and children. She is a full time administrator and works on writing books while on travel or on the weekends. She graduated from Lasalle University with a Bachelors degree in nursing, from Walden University with a Master's degree in nursing, and from Liberty University with a Master's Degree in Christian Ministry and Leadership. She enjoys reading, writing, and most of all growing in her faith of God. While this book is the first that she has authored, she has many more lined up in the future.
